name: D.O.G eat Apple
description:
D.O.G eat Apple is a Semi-2D Platformer, Semi-Physics Based Game, and Semi-Puzzler about Aiding a Robot Dog find his Home by Throwing Apples at him to Eat. That's 1.5x the Game!

Made for the WOWIE Jam 4.0.

Note: There are Lag Spikes after eating the first Apple and Activating the first Checkpoint - These only happen ONCE.

Credits:

FarawayDrip30 - Programming, Art, Music, Idea

Kenny - Placeholder Graphics
Sheyvan - Apple Smash SFX
Niwki - Apple Chew SFX
Dlanders - Open Mouth SFX
Timonunderwater - Close Mouth SFX
ABBO7 - Saw SFX
